message: Starting investigation of Modbus TCP broken pipe error. Will analyze PLCCommunicator implementation and connection management.
Analyzed PLCCommunicator and RealPLC implementations. Identified multiple connection management issues causing broken pipe errors.

Investigation completed successfully. Identified all root causes of broken pipe errors and confirmed implementer has addressed them with comprehensive fixes including connection health checking, automatic reconnection, errno 32 detection, and retry logic with exponential backoff.
